dublin_core.dcvalue: This trial compared 3 post hospitalization nursing care models for reducing congestive heart failure CHF readmission charges during 180 days of follow up Subjects received in person visits at baseline and 60 days plus 1 of 3 care modalities in the interim a video based home telecare b telephone calls and c usual care CHF related readmission charges were 80 lower in the telenursing groups compared to usual care and these groups also had significantly fewer CHF related emergency visits In person visits were more than 3 times longer than telenursing visits p Under 0 0001 only partially due to added travel time Patient self care adherence medications health status and satisfaction did not significantly differ between groups Telenursing can reduce CHF hospitalizations and allow increased frequency of communication with patients
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-12T11:43:02Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2003-05-16
A randomized trial of telenursing to reduce hospitalization for heart failure: patient-centered outcomes and nursing indicators.
